version_description: - Apply Audiobus-SDK 2.3.1
- Some bug fixes

- Add new option "Settings > SoundFont > Verify Memory Capacity"
- Fix that system exclusive messages sent from the internal MIDI file player is not applied to UI elements
- Fix noise of the internal reverb
- Some Stability Improvements

- Fix crash which occurs when loading illegal sf2
- Send all note off to CoreMIDI output when internal MIDI player is stopped

- Improve stability of the internal MIDI file player
- Fix that some UI elements did not work in the MixerView
- Fix that EG/Filter control panel has been updated with invalid data
- Update Audiobus SDK to 2.3.3
- Add workaround to prevent crash due to loading invalid sf2 files
- Fixed minor issue in AUv3 extension

- Improve stability regarding memory issues. If an error occurs on loading WaveTable, please substitute to small library, or try to increase free memory.
- Fix that scenes saved by version 2.x are not shown

- Add workaround for avoiding crash or audio buffer error related with other audio apps
- Prevent noise that occurs irregularly in AUV3Extension

- [AUv3Extension] Improve UI
- [AUv3Extension] Fix that AU instance may work with invalid sample rate
- Add "Settings > Synthesizer > Use Breath Control as Expression"
- Add workaround for the issue that bs-16i's initialization fails when launched from AUM as Inter-App Audio

- Improve AUv3 UI
- On importing from iCloud, multiple files can be selected (Multiple file selection can only be used with iOS 11 and iCloud Drive)
- Fix some stability issues
- Audiobus SDK 3.0.5
- Fix that MIDI messages from the internal file player were not delivered to Audiobus

・Now all WaveTable / Song / Scenes files are managed in “bs-16i” folder of your iCloud Drive, and synced between all iOS / iPadOS devices.
・New UI layout for iPadOS (New screen with keyboard and mixer, horizontally scrollable mixer)
・Each AUv3 instance now can save WaveTable file path.
・Improved AUv3 UI layout for various screen sizes
・Support latest iOS / iPadOS versions (Dark mode partly supported)
・Integrated with Audiobus SDK 3.0.11
・Version 4.0.1 has fixed the compatibility issue with AUv3 hosts other than AUM

・Now all WaveTable / Song / Scenes files are managed in “bs-16i” folder of your iCloud Drive, and synced between all iOS / iPadOS devices.
・New UI layout for iPadOS (New screen with keyboard and mixer, horizontally scrollable mixer)
・Each AUv3 instance now can save WaveTable file path.
・Improved AUv3 UI layout for various screen sizes
・Support latest iOS / iPadOS versions (Dark mode partly supported)
・Integrated with Audiobus SDK 3.0.11
・Version 4.0.1 - Fixed the compatibility issue with AUv3 hosts other than AUM
・Version 4.0.2 - For uses who do not want to use iCloud Drive, allow to use the previous sandbox that compatible with version 3.x for managing files. Please note that this workaround is enabled only if you disable iCloud Drive option on your device. Once iCloud Drive is enabled, files are moved to iCloud Drive. There is no feature to revert files to the previous place.

・Version 4.0.3 - Fix crashes on iPad Settings screen
・Version 4.0.4 - Move files from "iTunes File Sharing" on startup

・Now all WaveTable / Song / Scenes files are managed in “bs-16i” folder of your iCloud Drive, and synced between all iOS / iPadOS devices.
・New UI layout for iPadOS (New screen with keyboard and mixer, horizontally scrollable mixer)
・Each AUv3 instance now can save WaveTable file path.
・Improved AUv3 UI layout for various screen sizes
・Support latest iOS / iPadOS versions (Dark mode partly supported)
・Integrated with Audiobus SDK 3.0.11
・Version 4.0.1 - Fixed the compatibility issue with AUv3 hosts other than AUM

Please note that this workaround is enabled only if you disable iCloud Drive option on your device. Once iCloud Drive is enabled, files are moved to iCloud Drive. There is no feature to revert files to the previous place.
・Version 4.0.3 - Fix crashes on iPad Settings screen
・Version 4.0.4 - Move files from "iTunes File Sharing" on startup
・Workaround to avoid crashes on unloading WaveaTable

・Fix the crash that occurred on changing fineTune in AUv3
・A possible workaround for rarely crashes in receiving messages from CoreMIDI inputs
Apply AudioBus SDK v3.0.12
